common.title: Sekigae.app - High-Function Seating Chart Creator
common.description: Make perfect seating arrangements effortlessly, respecting your members' seat preferences (fixed, front/back, left/right), with Sekigae.app!
common.unsavedChanges:
If you navigate away from this page, all data, including student information and seating arrangement results, will be lost.
Be sure to export and save any unsaved data. Do you want to proceed?
common.noScript: Please turn on Javascript from your browser's settings.

seo.defaultDescription: 【「窓際希望」をかなえる席替え】独自アルゴリズムで、全員の座席の希望が通りやすい席替えアプリ。CSVのインポート・エクスポート機能付きで、席替え後の事務作業もラクラク！

classroom.description: Align the number of desks with the number of vertical and horizontal desks in the classroom, then select the seats that do not exist and gray them out.

students.description: Register members for seat rearrangement using 'Add Member' on the right, or import member data from a CSV list.
students.privacy: This program runs entirely in your browser, ensuring that your input data stays within your device and does not go online.

fixedPosition.description: Click to select a seat for this member from the seating chart. Seats marked 'Reserved' are unavailable due to other member seat assignments.

condition.disclaimer: Seat assignments are made based on the above settings. While efforts are made to accommodate preferences, it's possible that seats might not match the specified conditions. Assignments are only made if matching seats are available. If matching seats are unavailable due to shortage or other reasons, assignments may deviate from preferences.

distantOrPairStudent.title: ペアを離す・くっつける
distantOrPairStudent.distantStudentDescription: 離したい生徒は複数人選べます。

studentEasyInput.title: Easy Bulk Insert
studentEasyInput.label: Member Names (One per line)
studentEasyInput.help: New members will be appended after existing ones, if any.

studentQuickInput.title: 人数を指定して挿入
studentQuickInput.label: メンバーの人数
studentQuickInput.help: すでにメンバーが居る場合は、その出席番号に続けて末尾に挿入されます。

importFromCSV.title: CSV Import
importFromCSV.cannotLoadCSV: Cannot load CSV. Please check the file format and save it as 'UTF-8' encoding.

empty.description: No members have been added yet.

canExec.title: Ready to Execute Seating.
canExec.description1: Choose an effect and click 'Perform Seating.' Fullscreen mode is useful for projection purposes.
canExec.description2: After executing seating, you can rearrange seats by drag-and-drop. Rearranged data will be reflected in the exported CSV.

cannotExec.title: Cannot Execute Seating.
cannotExec.description1: Please ensure the number of seats matches the number of members.

csvSyntax.v1TemplateHeaderRow: 出席番号,名前,ふりがな,"左右の希望（L または R で記入。L＝左, R＝右）","前後の希望（F または R で記入。F＝前, R＝後ろ）",座席指定（左からr番目・前からc番目のとき→[r_c]のようにアンダーバーで区切る）
csvSyntax.v1ResultHeaderRow: 出席番号,名前,ふりがな,左右の希望,前後の希望,座席指定を流用する場合はこの列を削除,座席指定(R_C),行,列,座席通し番号(左前から)
csvSyntax.v2TemplateHeaderRow: 出席番号,名前,ふりがな,"左右の希望（L または R で記入。L＝左, R＝右）","前後の希望（F または R で記入。F＝前, R＝後ろ）",離したい生徒の出席番号（アンダーバー区切り）,ペアにしたい生徒の出席番号（1名）,座席指定（左からr番目・前からc番目のとき→[r_c]のようにアンダーバーで区切る）,v2
csvSyntax.v2ResultHeaderRow: 出席番号,名前,ふりがな,左右の希望,前後の希望,離したい生徒の出席番号,ペアにしたい生徒の出席番号,座席指定を流用する場合はこの列を削除,座席指定(R_C),行,列,座席通し番号(左前から),v2
